titles.title: Supporting the work of firefighters to educate and protect the Nation's communities, and the goals and ideals of Fire Prevention Week, October 7-13, 2007, as designated by the National Fire Protection Association.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2068)
Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
10/4/2007--Introduced.
Expresses support for: (1) the goals and ideals of Fire Prevention Week; and (2) the work of firefighters to educate and protect the nation's communities.
